name: CheckersGL
description:
A small casual checkers game. Can make different moves in the same position. Has an adjustable sound. Adapts to any screen resolution. No installation required.

Rules. You can move diagonally. By jumping over the opponent's checkers - in any direction. On one cell - only forward. At multiple jumps, moves are performing sequentially. A checker drawn to the last horizontal line becomes a dame and gets the opportunity to move on any number of cells and may move backward.
